EMP Cannon.Desc: An EMP generator using the ship's shields to prevent the pulse effect the firing ship.

MRC.Desc: The Magnetic Resonance Cannon projects a magnetic field through the target that resonates and amplifies the magnetic fields of its power systems causing a chain overload.

Avrora Cannon.Desc: Combines the effects of the EMP cannon and the MRC, has wide range that damages whole fleets.
